overview: Aziz Patel runs Student rental services and professional rental services over 25 years. His team provides excellent services for land lords and client in Huddersfield area. They are specialist in Student letting services. Aziz Patel and company directors are landlords themselves, so student haven truly understand how important it is for their clients to fully trust in a reliable and responsive service which is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
